import React from "react"; import adminLayout from "../hoc/adminLayout"; import axios from "axios"; class UsersPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.editUser=this.editUser.bind(this); this.deleteUser=this.deleteUser.bind(this); this.state = { users:[], id: '', } } editUser(e,id) { e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost/project9/admin/PHP/users.php?id='+id); } deleteUser(e,id) { e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost/project9/admin/PHP/deleteuser.php?id='+id) } componentDidMount() { axios.get('http://localhost/project9/admin/PHP/users.php') .then((res)=>{ this.setState({users: res.data}); console.log(this.state.users); }) } componentDidUpdate(){ axios.get('http://localhost/project9/admin/PHP/users.php') .then((res)=>{ this.setState({users: res.data}); console.log(this.state.users); }) } render(){ return <>
